title: Crash in Curl_vtls_apple_verify when no OCSP data

labels.name: appleOS
labels.description: specific to an Apple operating system

body:
### I did this

`Curl_vtls_apple_verify` function `ocsp_len` parameter is `size_t`. Yet it it passed `long` `ocsp_len` from `ossl_apple_verify` at
https://github.com/curl/curl/blob/928363f28ca533d743adcb70597c3e30917c6cbd/lib/vtls/openssl.c#L5130

`SSL_get_tlsext_status_ocsp_resp` returns -1 if no OCSP data is available. As a result `Curl_vtls_apple_verify` will call `CFRelease` with NULL `ocspdata` here: https://github.com/curl/curl/blob/928363f28ca533d743adcb70597c3e30917c6cbd/lib/vtls/apple.c#L218

The code does use `if(ocsp_len > 0) {` but since -1 is casted to `size_t` this check doesn't work as intended.

This gets triggered when curl is configured with `--with-apple-sectrust` and you attempt to use `-cert-status `, for example: `curl --cert-status https://curl.se`.

This results in SIGTRAP:

```
Exception Type:    EXC_BREAKPOINT (SIGTRAP)
Exception Codes:   0x0000000000000001, 0x000000018e879b08

Termination Reason:  Namespace SIGNAL, Code 5, Trace/BPT trap: 5
Terminating Process: exc handler [39901]


Application Specific Information:
*** CFRelease() called with NULL ***


Thread 0 Crashed:
0   CoreFoundation                	       0x18e879b08 CFRelease.cold.1 + 16
1   CoreFoundation                	       0x18e69121c CFRelease + 132
2   libcurl.4.dylib               	       0x10425c628 Curl_vtls_apple_verify + 648
3   libcurl.4.dylib               	       0x104261ae8 ossl_apple_verify + 236
4   libcurl.4.dylib               	       0x104260c48 Curl_ossl_check_peer_cert + 3788
5   libcurl.4.dylib               	       0x1042626d0 ossl_connect + 1136
6   libcurl.4.dylib               	       0x104266230 ssl_cf_connect + 352
7   libcurl.4.dylib               	       0x1041f5d34 cf_setup_connect + 112
```

### I expected the following

`--cert-status` not crashing when curl is configured with `--with-apple-sectrust`.

### curl/libcurl version

git master

### operating system

MacOS Tahoe 26.0.1 (25A362)
